notes:
[Fathom Feeder] is unquestionably sweet, but not really good enough to justify taking a two-colour card first pick.

[Clutch of Currents] is the pick as when awaenened is does a decent Man-o-war impression and in dire emergencies it does have the hidden mode of casting for a single blue.

The runner up is [Outnumber] as an efficient removal spell.
